briefTitle: Role of Hyaluronic Acid in Causing Cancer Stem Cell Growth in the Bones of Patients With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Role of Hyaluronic Acid in Cancer Stem Cell Niche
conditions: Breast Carcinoma Metastatic to the Bone, Stage IV Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: HAS2 expression, measured by single-cell PCR
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients must have newly diagnosed, histologically confirmed primary and/or metastatic breast cancer
* Ability to understand and the willingness to sign an Institutional Review Board (IRB)-approved informed consent document

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who have had chemotherapy or radiotherapy
